text: Faithful is a 1996 American crime comedy drama movie directed by Paul Mazursky (who also stars) and starring Cher, Chazz Palminteri, Ryan O'Neal, Amber Smith, Stephen Spinella. It was distributed by New Line Cinema. ==Other websites== * Category:1996 comedy-drama movies Category:1990s criminal comedy movies Category:1996 crime drama movies Category:American comedy movies Category:American crime drama movies Category:Movies based on plays Category:Movies directed by Paul Mazursky Category:1990s American drama movies
title: Faithful (1996 movie)
